amendatorysection.catchline: Stroke triage assessment tool; post on web site.
amendatorysection.para: The department shall adopt and distribute a nationally recognized, standardized stroke triage assessment tool. The department shall post the stroke triage assessment tool on the department's web site and provide a copy of the assessment tool to each emergency medical service licensed pursuant to the Emergency Medical Services Practice Act.

crossreference.para: Emergency Medical Services Practice Act, see section 38-1201.
